document.id: City of San Mateo, Cal., Ord. No. 2017-3
document.heading: AN EMERGENCY ORDINANCE OF THE CITY OF SAN MATEO IMPOSING A MORATORIUM ON THE USE OF ANY PROPERTY IN THE CITY OF SAN MATEO FOR THE CULTIVATION, PROCESSING, OR SALE OF MARIJUANA AND PROHIBITING THE OUTDOOR CULTIVATION OF MARIJUANA ON THE GROUNDS OF A PRIVATE RESIDENCE
